name: Shopping preferences selection in General Store app
description:

  I want to select my shopping preferences
  So that I can proceed to shop in the General Store app

steps.name: I select country "Argentina"
I enter my name "Jerome"
I choose gender "Male"
I click the "Let's Shop" button
I add the product "Air Jordan 4 Retro" to the cart
I proceed to checkout
I should see the product "Air Jordan 4 Retro" in the checkout page
I should see the correct total purchase amount in the checkout page
I should be able to place the order successfully

steps.name: I launch the General Store app
I select country "Australia"
I enter my name "Michelle"
I choose gender "Female"
I click the "Let's Shop" button
I add the product "Nike Blazer Mid" to the cart
I proceed to checkout
I should see the product "Nike Blazer Mid" in the checkout page
I should see the correct total purchase amount in the checkout page
I should be able to place the order successfully

name: Checkout product from General Store
description:
As a user
  I want to add a product to the cart and checkout
  So that I can complete a purchase
